languages.text: "Арильд, одумайся! Посмотри, что ты творишь со своей же семьей!" {n}Женщина лет шестидесяти, седая, но еще крепкая, стоит на коленях перед дородным мужчиной с белоснежной окладистой бородой, протянув к нему руки.{/n} "Пощади нас! Отпусти!"

traits.locale_text: "Арильд, одумайся! Посмотри, что ты творишь со своей же семьей!" {n}Женщина лет шестидесяти, седая, но еще крепкая, стоит на коленях перед дородным мужчиной с белоснежной окладистой бородой, протянув к нему руки.{/n} "Пощади нас! Отпусти!"

languages.text: "Come to your senses, Aryld! Look what you're doing to your own family!" {n}A woman of about sixty, grey-haired but still strong, is kneeling before a stocky man with a thick pure-white beard, stretching her arms toward him.{/n} "Take pity on us! Let us go!"
languages.original_text: "Арильд, одумайся! Посмотри, что ты творишь со своей же семьей!" {n}Женщина лет шестидесяти, седая, но еще крепкая, стоит на коленях перед дородным мужчиной с белоснежной окладистой бородой, протянув к нему руки.{/n} "Пощади нас! Отпусти!"

traits.locale_text: "Come to your senses, Aryld! Look what you're doing to your own family!" {n}A woman of about sixty, grey-haired but still firm of limb, is kneeling before a stocky man with a thick pure-white beard, stretching her arms toward him.{/n} "Take pity on us! Let us go!"

"Come to your senses, Aryld! Look what you're doing to your own family!" {n}A woman of about sixty, grey-haired but still firm of limb, is kneeling before a stocky man with a thick pure-white beard, stretching her arms toward him.{/n} "Take pity on us! Let us go!"

"Come to your senses, Aryld! Look what you're doing to your own family!" {n}A woman of about sixty, grey-haired but still firm of limb, is kneeling before a stocky man with a thick pure-white beard, stretching her arms toward him.{/n} "Take pity on us! Let us go!"

"Come to your senses, Aryld! Look what you're doing to your own family!" {n}A woman of about sixty, grey-haired but still firm of limb, is kneeling before a stocky man with a thick pure-white beard, stretching her arms toward him.{/n} "Take pity on us! Let us go!"

"Come to your senses, Aryld! Look what you're doing to your own family!" {n}A woman of about sixty, grey-haired but still strong, is kneeling before a stocky man with a thick pure-white beard, stretching her arms toward him.{/n} "Take pity on us! Let us go!"

"Come to your senses, Aryld! Look what you're doing to your own family!" {n}A woman of about sixty, grey-haired but still strong, is kneeling before a stocky man with a thick pure-white beard, stretching her arms toward him.{/n} "Take pity on us! Let us go!"

languages.text: "Kommt doch zur Vernunft, Aryld! Seht doch, was Ihr Eurer eigenen Familie antut!" {n}Eine Frau von etwa sechzig Jahren, mit grauen Haaren, aber noch kräftig, kniet vor einem untersetzten Mann mit einem dichten, schlohweißen Bart. Sie streckt ihre Arme zu ihm aus.{/n} "Habt doch Erbarmen mit uns! Lasst uns gehen!"
languages.original_text: "Come to your senses, Aryld! Look what you're doing to your own family!" {n}A woman of about sixty, grey-haired but still strong, is kneeling before a stocky man with a thick pure-white beard, stretching her arms toward him.{/n} "Take pity on us! Let us go!"

traits.locale_text: "Kommt doch zur Vernunft, Aryld! Seht doch, was Ihr Eurer eigenen Familie antut!" {n}Eine Frau von etwa sechzig Jahren, mit grauen Haaren, aber noch kräftig, kniet vor einem untersetzten Mann mit einem dichten, schlohweißen Bart. Sie streckt ihre Arme zu ihm aus.{/n} "Habt doch Erbarmen mit uns! Lasst uns gehen!"

languages.text: « Ressaisis-toi, Aryld ! Regarde ce que tu fais à ta propre famille ! » {n}crie une femme d'une soixantaine d'années aux cheveux grisonnants, mais encore pleine de vigueur, agenouillée devant un homme trapu à l'épaisse barbe blanche vers qui elle tend les bras.{/n} « Ayez pitié de nous ! Laissez-nous partir ! »
languages.original_text: "Come to your senses, Aryld! Look what you're doing to your own family!" {n}A woman of about sixty, grey-haired but still strong, is kneeling before a stocky man with a thick pure-white beard, stretching her arms toward him.{/n} "Take pity on us! Let us go!"

traits.locale_text: « Ressaisis-toi, Aryld ! Regarde ce que tu fais à ta propre famille ! » {n}crie une femme d'une soixantaine d'années aux cheveux grisonnants, mais aux gestes encore sûrs, agenouillée devant un homme trapu à l'épaisse barbe blanche vers qui elle tend les bras.{/n} « Ayez pitié de nous ! Laissez-nous partir ! »

languages.text: “快清醒过来吧，艾瑞德！看看你对你的家人都做了些什么啊！”{n}一个约六十岁、头发花白但身体结实的老妇人，跪在一个留着浓密白胡子的健壮男人面前，朝他伸出了双臂。{/n}“可怜可怜我们吧！放我们走吧！”
languages.original_text: "Come to your senses, Aryld! Look what you're doing to your own family!" {n}A woman of about sixty, grey-haired but still strong, is kneeling before a stocky man with a thick pure-white beard, stretching her arms toward him.{/n} "Take pity on us! Let us go!"

traits.locale_text: “快清醒过来吧，艾瑞德！看看你对你的家人都做了些什么啊！”{n}一个约六十岁、头发花白但身体结实的老妇人，跪在一个留着浓密白胡子的健壮男人面前，朝他伸出双臂。{/n}“可怜可怜我们吧！放我们走吧！”

languages.text: 「我に返れ、アリルド！自分の家族に何をしているか見ろ！」{n}60歳くらいの女性…髪は灰色だが、強そうな体つきをしている。太く真っ白なひげを生やした、がっしりとした男の前にひざまずき、彼に腕を伸ばしている。{/n}「どうかご慈悲を！行かせてください！」
languages.original_text: "Come to your senses, Aryld! Look what you're doing to your own family!" {n}A woman of about sixty, grey-haired but still strong, is kneeling before a stocky man with a thick pure-white beard, stretching her arms toward him.{/n} "Take pity on us! Let us go!"

traits.locale_text: 「我に返れ、アリルド！自分の家族に何をしているか見ろ！」{n}60歳くらいの女性、髪は灰色だが、なおしっかりとした体つきをしている。太く真っ白なひげを生やした、がっしりとした男の前にひざまずき、彼に腕を伸ばしている。{/n}「どうかご慈悲を！行かせてください！」

languages.text: «¡Vuelve a tus cabales, Aryld! Mira lo que le estás haciendo a tu propia familia». {n}Una mujer de unos sesenta años, canosa pero fuerte, está arrodillada ante un hombre fornido de espesa barba blanca y pura, extendiendo los brazos hacia él.{/n} «¡Ten piedad de nosotros! ¡Déjanos marchar!».
languages.original_text: "Come to your senses, Aryld! Look what you're doing to your own family!" {n}A woman of about sixty, grey-haired but still strong, is kneeling before a stocky man with a thick pure-white beard, stretching her arms toward him.{/n} "Take pity on us! Let us go!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Vuelve a tus cabales, Aryld! Mira lo que le estás haciendo a tu propia familia». {n}Una mujer de unos sesenta años, canosa pero aún de miembros fuertes, está arrodillada ante un hombre fornido de espesa barba blanca y pura, extendiendo los brazos hacia él.{/n} «¡Ten piedad de nosotros! ¡Déjanos marchar!».

languages.text: "Aklını başına devşir Aryld! Ailene yaptıklarına bak!" {n}Altmış yaşlarında, kır saçlı ama hâlâ güçlü bir kadın; kalın ak sakallı tıknaz bir adamın önünde diz çökmüş, kollarını ona doğru uzatıyor.{/n} "Acı bize! Bırak gidelim!"
languages.original_text: "Come to your senses, Aryld! Look what you're doing to your own family!" {n}A woman of about sixty, grey-haired but still strong, is kneeling before a stocky man with a thick pure-white beard, stretching her arms toward him.{/n} "Take pity on us! Let us go!"

traits.locale_text: "Aklını başına devşir Aryld! Ailene yaptıklarına bak!" {n}Altmış yaşlarında, kır saçlı ama hâlâ güçlü bir kadın; kalın ak sakallı tıknaz bir adamın önünde diz çökmüş, kollarını ona doğru uzatıyor.{/n} "Acı bize! Bırak gidelim!"
